label.note: *Note: if the connection fails, please check your password

error.username: The username must follow the pattern
error.need-network: We need a network connection to load the list of institutions. Please enable networking and restart the application.
error.duplicate:
This network is already available in the device.
Please go to Settings > Wi-Fi Networks and remove it first
error.mobileconfig:
Your device is configured through a configuration profile.
Please go to Settings > General > Profile and remove it
error.invalid-eap: Invalid selected profile. If the error persists, please contact your administrator
error.invalid-method: No valid authentication method available from the selected profile
error.invalid-oauth: You have to authorize the app to be able to configure the WiFi connection
error.terms: You need accept the Terms of Use

text.configure: You are about to install a Wi-Fi network profile.
text.reconfigure:
Hi, it appears that you have configured this device already.
Do you want to reconfigure it?
text.title: Reconfigure geteduroam
text.message: There are 5 days left for your geteduroam profile to expire, click to reconfigure it
